amendment.description: To provide for the transfer of the Battleship U.S.S. Iowa (BB-61).

vote.text: Amendment SA 1399 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1399 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S8651-8653; text: CR S8653) To provide for the transfer of the Battleship U.S.S. Iowa (BB-61).
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1399 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1399 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Feinstein.
